review: Comparing this to the Chromecast and Roku3, the AppleTV is a nice device, but more like a mix between the Chromecast and Roku. It has the easy casting that you get with the Chromecast but with any apple device, plus the apps and remote like with the Roku. The thing that sets the AppleTV apart from just being a hybrid of the two is the design and user interface. The hardware feels sturdier and more modern, especially the remote compared to the remote on the Roku. The user interface is modern, efficient, and easy to navigate.Anything you can stream on your Apple device, you can stream to your AppleTV.  Knowing Apple, they will continue to improve this device in the future with great ingenuity.
